title: Oru Thuli Vishamaai Lyrics Aadhi Bhagavan Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Oru Thuli Vishamaai
Singers: Sharib Sabri, Shreya Goshal
Movie: Aadhi Bhagavan
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics : Snehan


Oru Thuli Vishamaai 
kadhal uyirl kalakudhae
Arainodi pozhudhil uyirum
irandhe pirakudhe, pirakudhe , mayakkudhe

velludhey veludhey murangalai velludhey
kolludhey kolludhey thavanayil kolludhey

unnai marakka thunidhu paarthaen
ada indha nenjam vara marukkudhey
varaya varaya alithu paarthaen
adhil meendum unnai manam varayudhey

mounathaaley paasayaaley,
aasayaalaey avasthayaaley
kadhal thaedi uyir udharudhey

Oru Thuli Vishamaai
kadhal uyirl kalakudhae
Arainodi pozhudhil uyirum
irandhe pirakudhe, pirakudhe , mayakkudhe

Maranam thaedum podhum
mayakkam kondu jeevan
vazhavadhen vazhavadhen
uravukaaga yengi manusapoovum
ondru saavadhen , saavadhen

Thadividhikaadhe, manam mandiyidum podhum
uyir thunbam padupodhum
unnai marakaadhe

Marumurai ini pirapadhaa,
un arugile thanithirupadhaa
kadhale ingu maruppadhaa
illai verupadhaa
oru vidaikodu vidaikodu idhyathill
idhyathill idam kodu
thudikkiren thavikiren
thudikkiren thavikiren , thavikiren

Kadhal ennum theeyill karugakooda penmai
thundhadhey thunidhadhey
Amila nadhiyai kooda amudham endru enni
neendhudhey neendhudhey

Oli theriyaadhey, vizhi pathikira podhu
udal thithikira podhu vilai kidayaadhey

udaikiren naan udaikiren ada
unvasam saranadaikiren
karaikiren mella uraikiren
unnil medhaikiren
ini mudivedu mudivedu idhayathil
idhyathill idam kodu
thudikkiren thavikiren
thudikkiren thavikiren , thavikiren

Oru Thuli Vishamaai
kadhal uyirl kalakudhae
Arainodi pozhudhil uyirum
irandhe pirakudhe, pirakudhe , mayakkudhe
